title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=160$$ and $$t=2.5$$, we can substitute $$160$$ for $$d$$ and $$2.5$$ for $$t$$ into the equation, which gives us $$160=2.5r$$.
speech: Since we know  d is equal to 160  and  t, is equal to 2.5 , we can substitute  160  for  d  and  2.5  for  t  into the equation, which gives us  160 is equal to 2.5 r .

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$r$$, we can divide both sides by $$2.5$$.
